remarks.format: ## Remarks 中定义的指令值`OpCodes`枚举。The instruction values are defined in the `OpCodes` enumeration. 使用创建标签，并且它们将流内的位置固定使用。Labels are created using , and their location within the stream is fixed by using . 如果使用单字节指令，则标签可以表示最多 127 个字节流的跳转。If a single-byte instruction is used, the label can represent a jump of at most 127 bytes along the stream. `opcode` 必须代表分支指令。`opcode` must represent a branch instruction. 分支是相对的说明，因为`label`在修复过程将替换到分支的正确偏移量。Because branches are relative instructions, `label` will be replaced with the correct offset to branch during the fixup process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例阐释如何创建具有跳转表的动态方法。The code sample below illustrates the creation of a dynamic method with a jump table. 跳转表使用一个数组生成。The jump table is built using an array of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是透明的且可以从部分受信任代码调用。This method is transparent, and can be called from partially trusted code. 如果之前已发出任何 MSIL 指令，则在访问属性，则返回 0 （零）。If the property is accessed before any MSIL instructions have been emitted, it returns 0 (zero). 当在为动态语言生成 MSIL 时，此属性可用于将 MSIL 流中的偏移量映射到源的代码行号。When MSIL is generated for dynamic languages, this property can be used to map offsets in the MSIL stream to source code line numbers. 生成的信息可用于引发异常时提供堆栈跟踪。The resulting information can be used to provide stack traces when exceptions are thrown.
